author: kfogel
msg: Resolve issue #816 ("Silent failure in svn log -r"):
(dav_svn__log_report): Return error via the log_receiver, since
there's no other way to return it.
(log_receiver): Handle null date, author, or message.
(log_message_receiver): Handle null date, author, or message, and
handle empty string case for date.  Also, print a more accurate
message for rev 0 case.  For example, in "svn log -r0:1", the old
(log_message_receiver_xml): Handle null date, author, or message.

author: ghudson
msg: * merge-cmd.c (svn_cl__merge): Initialize notify_func to NULL, or it
won't get initialized when opt_state->quiet is set.
* main.c (svn_cl__option): Allow 'q' option for all commands whose
primary purpose isn't to print stuff out.
import-cmd.c (svn_cl__import): Don't print commit info when quiet.
* svn_help_log_switch_stdout: Update golden help output for "svn

author: cmpilato
msg: The `copies' table now stores source transaction instead of source
(svn_fs__dag_copied_from): Get the source revision indirectly via

author: blair
msg: Validate the command line arguments so when you run this script by
hand and mess up, you don't pass invalid arguments to svnlook and
generate an email message with a bunch of error messages in it.
